alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Marion County through 900 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Silver Springs Shores, or 7 miles southeast of Ocala, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Weirsdale, Sparr, Anthony, Ocklawaha, Moss Bluff, Silver Springs Shores, Lake Weir, Santos and Ocala Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion
